alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, Pasco, southeastern Hernando, northwestern Manatee, Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 1230 PM EST... At 1129 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bushnell to near East Lake to 37 miles west of Anna Maria. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Bradenton, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Seminole, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Bushnell, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Fort Desoto Park, Saint Petersburg, Lutz, Brandon, Fish Hawk, St. Petersburg and St. Pete Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
